stories.text: I am learning android development and here's a project I made, a sudoku solver using MLKIT text recognition. I would appreciate any feedback, thanks!
stories.title: Show HN: Android app for solving sudokus from images

stories.text:
UK researchers "identified five types of bacteria which were common in urine and tissue samples from men with aggressive prostate cancer:"

Anaerococcus, Peptoniphilus, Porphyromonas, Fenollaria and Fusobacterium

https://quadram.ac.uk/bacteria-linked-to-prostate-cancer/

https://sputniknews.com/20220420/breakthrough-in-oncology-treatment-newly-discovered-bacteria-might-save-thousands-of-lives-1094903537.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anaerococcus

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peptoniphilus

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Porphyromonas

Fenollaria

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fusobacterium

Prolonged improper dietary dosing of zinc can also lead to prostate problems, with zinc overdosing being associated with increase in prostate cancer, and zinc insufficiency associated with enlarged prostate.
